動物用藥品名稱: 北歐家禽里奧病毒感染症不活化疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防家禽里奧病毒感染症感染。
ingredients: 10^6.3TCID50 OF INACTIVATED AND CONCENTRATEDREOVIRUS STRAIN S1133 0.04ML; 10^6.3TCID50 OF INACTIVATED ANDCONCENTRATED REOVIRUS STRAIN 2408 0.04ML; 10^6.3TCID50 OFINACTIVATED AND CONCENTRATED REOVIRUS STRAIN SS412 0.04ML;THIMEROSAL 0.05MCG; STERILE DEIONIZED WATER; OIL ADJUVANT 0.35ML.
